title.v: Cập nhật số chứng từ cho nhiều bút toán

action.text:
declare @q nvarchar(4000) declare @size tinyint, @count numeric(12, 0), @maxnum numeric(12, 0), @c nvarchar(1), @p1 varchar(32), @p2 varchar(32), @p3 varchar(32), @n1 varchar(32), @n2 varchar(32), @startnum numeric(12, 0), @j int, @len int, @len_p2 int
select top 1 @size = b.[length] from sysobjects a join syscolumns b on a.id = b.id where a.name = 'dmpbky1' and b.name = 'so_ct' select top 0 stt_rec, ma_bt, so_ct, identity(int, 1, 1) as id_stt into #t from vdmpbky1 select * into #keys from @keys select @so_bd = replace(@so_bd, '''', ''), @type = replace(@type, '''', ''), @ma_dvcs = replace(@ma_dvcs, '''', '')
select @q = 'insert into #t (stt_rec, ma_bt, so_ct) select stt_rec, ma_bt, '''' from vdmpbky1 where ky = ' + rtrim(cast(@ky as int)) + ' and nam = ' + rtrim(cast(@nam as int)) + case when @type <> '1' then ' and ltrim(rtrim(so_ct)) = ''''' else '' end + case when @ma_dvcs <> '' then ' and dbo.ff_InList(ma_dvcs, ''' + rtrim(@ma_dvcs) + ''') = 1' else '' end + ' and exists(select 1 from #keys where patindex(''%'' + rtrim(ltrim(ma_bt)) + ''%'', text) > 0) order by ma_dvcs, ma_bt, tk_no, tk_co' exec sp_executesql @q
if exists(select 1 from #t) begin select @j = 0, @p1 = '', @p2 = '', @p3 = '', @n1 = '', @n2 = '', @startnum = 0, @len = len(@so_bd), @len_p2 = 0, @maxnum = 0, @size = isnull(@size, 12) while @j < @len begin set @c = substring(@so_bd, @j + 1, 1) if patindex('[0-9]', @c) > 0 begin if @p3 = '' select @p2 = @p2 + @c, @n1 = @n1 + @c else select @p3 = @p3 + @c, @n2 = @n2 + @c if @n1 <> '' and @n2 <> '' and len(@n1) < len(@n2) select @n1 = @n2, @p1 = @p1 + @p2 + substring(@p3, 1, len(@p3) - len(@n2)), @p2 = @n2, @p3 = '', @n2 = '' end else begin if @p2 = '' select @p1 = @p1 + @c else select @p3 = @p3 + @c, @n2 = '' end set @j = @j + 1 end
if @p2 <> '' select @len_p2 = len(@p2), @startnum = @p2, @maxnum = replicate('9', @len_p2) if @p2 = '' begin select '' as array$, 1 as value, rtrim(ma_bt) as ma_bt, so_ct from #t return end
-- Update voucher number for temp table select @count = count(*) from #t if (@count + @startnum) > @maxnum or (len(@p1) + @len_p2 + len(@p3)) > @size begin select '' as array$, 2 as value, rtrim(ma_bt) as ma_bt, so_ct from #t return end
update #t set so_ct = @p1 + right(replicate('0', @size) + ltrim(@startnum + id_stt - 1), @len_p2) + @p3 update #t set so_ct = dbo.ff_PadL(rtrim(so_ct), @size)
update dmpbky1 set so_ct = b.so_ct from dmpbky1 a join #t b on a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec and a.ma_bt = b.ma_bt where ky = @ky and nam = @nam
select '' as array$, 0 as value, rtrim(ma_bt) as ma_bt, so_ct from #t end
select '' as array$, -1 as value, '' as ma_bt, '' as so_ct return
